data.title: Guest Reservations
data.meta_description:
As an independent booking service offering over 100,000 hotels 
    worldwide, we can get you the same deals you expect with a bigger travel agency or direct from the hotel.
data.text: Youth Hostel Rapperswil-Jona offers dormitory and private rooms with a balcony and view of the garden, 2789 feet from the Blumenau Train Station. The hostel features free Wi-Fi and all bookings include a buffet breakfast. Healthy 3-course dinners are on offer daily (booking required in advance), drinks & snacks are available in self-service fridges at reception. Food can be eaten in the dining room or outside on the garden terrace. Rooms are decorated with wooden furnishings and have large windows, a sink and a lockable wardrobe. Shared bathroom facilities have showers and toilets and these can be found on the first and second floors. The hostel has a communal sitting room where guests can enjoy: lounge seating, TV, small guest library, table football (free), & children's play corner. The guest kitchen has a shared fridge, microwave, kettle, and sink. Children can play outside or visit the nearby farm with lots of animals. The games room is equipped with an Air Hockey and a Pinball machine. Rapperswilâ€™s historic center is a 25-minute walk away and Lake Zurich is a 5-minute walk. Rapperswil Train Station is 1.2 mi away while the Jona Train Station is 1.1 mi away.
